statements: SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id AS ID, key_value AS Value FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id ASC;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-ba9876543210';
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_value IS NOT NULL ORDER BY key_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT key_id, key_value, encryption_algo FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, encryption_algo, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 3;
SELECT data_id, data_value FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT data_id, data_value, key_id FROM sensitive_data WHERE key_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys JOIN sensitive_data ON encryption_keys.key_id = sensitive_data.key_id;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE encryption_algo = 'AES'
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data JOIN encryption_keys ON sensitive_data.key_id = encryption_keys.key_id
SELECT key_id, COUNT(*) FROM sensitive_data GROUP BY key_id
SELECT encryption_keys.key_id, encryption_keys.key_value, sensitive_data.data_value FROM encryption_keys INNER JOIN sensitive_data ON encryption_keys.key_id = sensitive_data.key_id
SELECT key_id, key_value, key_description FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_id = 10;
SELECT encrypted_data, data_description, data_id FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT transmission_id, transmission_date, encrypted_content FROM data_transmission WHERE transmission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT key_id, key_description FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_value, key_description FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_description LIKE '%secret%';
SELECT data_id, data_description FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT transmission_date, transmission_id FROM data_transmission WHERE transmission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys UNION SELECT * FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY key_id DESC, data_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT data_id, data_name, data_value FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY data_name DESC;
SELECT transmission_id, source_address, destination_address FROM data_transmission WHERE transmission_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM transmission_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 2;
SELECT data_id, data_name, data_value FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_name LIKE '%credit card%';
SELECT * FROM data_transmission WHERE source_address = '192.168.1.1' ORDER BY transmission_id DESC;
SELECT transmission_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM transmission_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND log_message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value, encryption_algorithm FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT data_id, data_value, encrypted FROM sensitive_data WHERE encrypted = true;
SELECT txn_id, user_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE key_id = 3 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT data_id, data_value FROM sensitive_data WHERE encrypted = TRUE AND key_id = 5 ORDER BY data_id ASC;
SELECT txn_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, message, log_timestamp FROM logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY log_timestamp;
